goal: Generalize LLM extraction for all conversation types: phone, chat, video, in-person, and all directions

fields.who: LLM Data Extraction Pipeline consumers (Rewst, ServiceTitan workflows, direct API callers)
fields.what: Add conversation context model supporting 6 modalities (phone, chat, video, in-person, voicemail, email) and 4 directions (inbound, outbound, internal, multi-party)
fields.when: Before next production deployment of extraction pipeline
fields.where: LLM Data Extraction Pipeline (workflow 8ZN0l9BHo1zBKDnl) and category configs
fields.why: Current implementation assumes AI-to-human inbound phone calls only, breaking extraction accuracy for chats, meetings, outbound calls, and other modalities
fields.how: Add optional conversation_context with modality/direction/participants fields, modify category prompts to use context-aware role mapping, maintain backward compatibility
fields.which: 9 category configs (caller, contact, routing, request, consent, call_validity, sales, sentiment, coaching) + input validator
fields.lest: Incorrect role attribution, wrong sentiment analysis, broken coaching metrics, inappropriate terminology for non-phone modalities
fields.with: OpenAI Structured Outputs API, n8n-MCP, existing category architecture
fields.measuredBy: 95%+ accuracy across 6 modalities and 4 directions, zero regression on existing AI-to-human inbound phone extractions

summary: Generalize LLM extraction for all conversation types: phone, chat, video, in-person, and all directions

history.goal: Generalize LLM extraction to handle human-to-human, outbound, and internal calls without hardcoded AI-to-human assumptions
